com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest

Interface RestfulMappingClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingEnabledRestfulMappingClient

    public interface RestfulMappingClient

    Provides an interface for communicating with a RESTful web service. Responses are converted using a MessageConverter and returned as objects.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/06/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • setConnectionTimeout

        void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the connection timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout used until a connection is established with the web service.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout to set in milliseconds

      • setResponseTimeout

        void setResponseTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the response timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout for waiting for data from the web service. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout to set in milliseconds

      • setHttpParams

        void setHttpParams(org.apache.http.params.HttpParams httpParams)
        Sets the HttpParams for this RestfulClient.
        Parameters:
        httpParams - the HttpParams to set

      • setAuthStrategy

        void setAuthStrategy(AuthenticationStrategy authStrategy)
        Sets the AuthenticationStrategy to use for requests.
        Parameters:
        authStrategy - the AuthenticationStrategy to use or null if there should be none

      • setMessageConverter

        void setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
        Sets the MessageConverter to use. The MessageConverter is responsible for converting web service responses to objects.
        Parameters:
        messageConverter - the MessageConverter to set
